items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get This Dress!!
items.body: Material Thickness: 10/10. Material is thick, soft and comfortable. Will definitely keep you warm during the winter/cold weather. Fit: does have some stretch to it so I would suggest sizing down. See through: Due to the thick material, you are unable to see through this dress. Quality: Good quality and worth it for the price. Read more
items.author: Lakisha Dumas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Donâ€™t let the looks deceive you when you get it and take it out of the package and think no way this is going to fit it because IT WILL! When I first got this dress and took it out of the pack I had ordered my normal dress size I thought wow this must run really small, I was wrong. It runs true to size. I put this tiny thing on and it fits great! It is a dress that hugs you, itâ€™s very flattering and great material and great quality! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, yet casual
items.body: Beautiful sweater dress. Love the color and how it can go with any other color to accessorise. Material is very soft and thick. Will keep me warm. Im wearing a large but a medium would give a more semi snug feel. It looks snug but it stretches so much that a medium would've been best. It snaps back into shape after wear. Overall a great buy. Sexy, yet casual. I'll order another in a med and different color. Read more
items.author: Tmari

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Obviously used and worn dress
items.body: Bought one dress and loved it so I went back on and bought another in black. Very very upset! The dres I was sent had no tags on it. Had quite a bit of dog hair on it. Two pulls and reeked of someoneâ€™s perfume. This was obviously work and then returned. So upset that this would be sent out to me. Read more
items.author: Alexa Graves

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Burgundy, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Grey1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
